features.name: HTML
features.description: Learn the structure of web pages with HTML.

topics.name: Introduction to HTML
topics.description: HTML is the building block of web pages.

assignments.title: Create a Basic Web Page
assignments.details: Design a webpage with a title, heading, and a paragraph.

topics.name: HTML Forms
topics.description: Learn to create interactive forms using HTML.

assignments.title: Create a Registration Form
assignments.details: Create a form with fields for name, email, and password.

topics.name: HTML Tables
topics.description: Organize data in a tabular format using tables.

assignments.title: Create a Student Table
assignments.details: Design a table displaying student names and scores.

topics.name: HTML Lists
topics.description: Learn about ordered and unordered lists.

assignments.title: Create a To-Do List
assignments.details: Use an unordered list to display a to-do list.

topics.name: HTML Media
topics.description: Embed images, videos, and audio in your web pages.

assignments.title: Add an Image to Your Page
assignments.details: Embed an image and provide alternative text.

features.name: CSS
features.description: Style your web pages with CSS.

topics.name: Introduction to CSS
topics.description: CSS helps style your web pages beautifully.

assignments.title: Change Background Color
assignments.details: Set the background color of a webpage to light blue.

topics.name: CSS Selectors
topics.description: Learn to target HTML elements with CSS selectors.

programs.title: CSS Selectors Example

assignments.title: Style Different Elements
assignments.details: Use IDs and classes to style specific elements.

topics.name: CSS Flexbox
topics.description: Learn to create flexible layouts using Flexbox.

programs.title: Flexbox Example

assignments.title: Create a Centered Layout
assignments.details: Center a div both horizontally and vertically.

topics.name: CSS Grid
topics.description: Build complex layouts with CSS Grid.

assignments.title: Design a Grid Layout
assignments.details: Create a grid with three columns and two rows.

topics.name: CSS Animation
topics.description: Add animations to your web pages.

programs.title: CSS Animation Example

assignments.title: Animate a Box
assignments.details: Create a box that changes color over time.

features.name: JavaScript
features.description: Add interactivity to your web pages with JavaScript.

topics.name: JavaScript Basics
topics.description: Learn basic syntax and variables in JavaScript.

assignments.title: Display a Message
assignments.details: Create a script that logs a message to the console.

topics.name: JavaScript Functions
topics.description: Learn to create and call functions in JavaScript.

assignments.title: Create a Greeting Function
assignments.details: Write a function that returns a greeting message.

assignments.title: Modify DOM Elements
assignments.details: Change the text of a paragraph element with JavaScript.

assignments.title: Add a Click Event
assignments.details: Create a button that shows an alert on click.

assignments.title: Manipulate Arrays
assignments.details: Write a script to add and remove items from an array.
